results.title: miracle wall decal -  Wall Quote Vinyl Decal Sticker wall lettering Faith Friends Couple Bedroom Living Family love Mother heart live laugh
results.description:
Miracle Quote Sign vinyl decal / sticker


You have several sizes and colors to choose from.

These decals are made out of a high quality vinyl that will last many many years. The decal can be removed whenever you would like and it does not damage the wall or paint. The decal is a cut-out, so this means the background will be whatever surface you put it on.  The decal in the picture is Matte Black.

This decal has many different applications. They can be used on your Front door, wall, kids room, bedroom, bathroom, game room, mirror, kitchen, window, man cave, or any smooth surface. The options really are endless.

The decals are easy to apply and will be shipped with detailed instruction in case you have any questions.

The "Matte" finish option does not have a gloss and does not reflect light making them perfect for some applications. Every color that is not matte will have a high gloss finish.


***If you do not see exactly what you are wanting, please contact me. I can make custom decals to fit your needs.***

results.title: Live, Laugh, Lobotomy, Cross Stitch Pattern; Snarky, Dark-Humor Digital Pattern
results.description:
Live, Laugh, Lobotomy, Cross Stitch Pattern; Snarky, Dark-Humor Digital Pattern

We've all seen the "Live, Laugh, Love" signs, but that might feel a little too sunshiny for some of us. This dark humor pattern acknowledges that sometimes the darker side of life can't just be smiled away. 

Lobotomies themselves have a horrific history and while some forms of the procedure still exist today (though not performed with an icepick!), it was once used to silence a wide swath of people who were labeled "different" by society. I don't want to make light of that barbarous history with this pattern, but to provide an outlet for the complicated feelings surrounding it. Mental health is a human right. 

A Blackwork version of this pattern is also available in my shop.

* This is a PDF pattern for you to stitch*

Finished pattern is 115 stitches wide by 128 stitches high.

Total size depends on the Aida cloth size:
    	 18ct— 6.4 x 7.1 inches (or 16.2 x 18.1 cm)
    	 16ct— 7.2 x 8 inches (or 18.3 x 120.3 cm)
     	 14ct— 8.2 x 9.1 inches (or 20.9 x 23.2 cm)

PDF includes:
		• Preview sheet with sizing info
		• Single-page symbols on color block sheet
		• Enlarged symbols on color block sheets
		• Enlarged black & white symbols sheets
		• Thread color key (DMC colors)

results.title: Uninspiring Unmotivational Nihilism Gift Live Laugh Love Death Doom Despair Mug Funny
results.description:
Sick of the live, laugh, loves of life? Balance it out with some death, doom and despair. Unmotivational, uninspiring but still looks lovely on your coffee table.

High quality designed mug and printed with the best machinery. These mugs stay bright with sublimation printing - dishwasher and microwave safe.
Mugs are such a great gift as you don't have to worry about clothing sizes. This makes a wonderful birthday, Christmas or anniversary present; for a housewarming or someone moving away. 

I love to create niche designs using references from films, puns and subcultures.

results.title: Live Laugh Love bracelet personalized cuff bracelet custom jewelry gift for friend engraved cuff bracelet personalized monogrammed with name
results.description:
Personalized cuff bracelet. Says, 

"Live (heart) Laugh (heart) Love"

Bracelet measures 6". One size should fit everyone, as you can bend the bracelet as needed to make it fit.  It is considered, "One size fits most", as 6" is the industry standard for cuff bracelets. 

You are welcome to change the wording as well as add details to the inside of the cuff. Character limits are as follows:

Outside: 60 Characters, max
Inside: 40 characters, max

***TO PERSONALIZE: Please use the "notes to seller" box found on the check you page to let me know exactly what you'd like your bracelet to say. 

Please use the drop down menu provided to select the metal you'd like your bracelet to be made in. If you have any questions at all about the materials, do not hesitate to contact WhirlyBird Designs. All materials used in this shop are hypoallergenic and 100% nickel free.

If you would like a larger quantity than what etsy will allow you, please just send me a message. I am able to make large quantities of everything in my shop, at all times, I just don't always notice when the quantity is set to a low amount on the item's description's page. Quantities up to 100 (and sometimes more!) is not a problem, as long as I am given a little notice ;)

This item will ship in a pretty silk organza bag. If you'd like to add a gift box for $1.50, here is the link: 
https://www.etsy.com/listing/119704902/add-a-gift-wrapped-box?ref=shop_home_active_1

This pieces is made by hand, by me :)

results.title: Live Laugh Love,Sublimation Transfer,  Mug Can Holder
results.description:
**Please note this is a sublimation transfer to be placed onto your shirt, creeper, mug, or can holder.

You must have  a heat press, because a  iron will not work. Transfer must be used on a shirt that is at least 50% polyester, but a 100% is preferable. A 50% polyester item will give you a  vintage look. Shirts should be light in color white or heather gray are best. The sublimation process involves the dye going into the item so if it is used on a dark colored shirt it will not show up well and if it is used on black will not show up at all.  


REQUIREMENTS:
-Heat Press (no iron)
-White or Light Colored Fabric (white and light heather grey are the best choices)
-Garment MUST be at least 50% polyester, the higher the poly content the more vibrant the colors (lower polyester content gives a vintage look).

Instructions: (detailed version shipped with order)
– 385-400 degrees F
– 45-55 seconds
– medium pressure

Watermarks will be removed upon purchase.

results.title: Word image Kombi "Sea breeze ahoi" for the wall
results.description:
Sea breeze (15 x 15 cm) ahoi (10 x 10 cm) .
These two text "pictures" can be combined wonderfully, but also give a beautiful picture separately/individually.
Especially nice maybe on your photo wall from the last sea holiday?

These two handmade panels are created in many individual steps and make every wall and maybe you happy :-))
Whether hung on a nail, or placed on the window sill (28 mm thick - stand stable) these text plates always make a good picture :-)
The text plates are 28 mm thick, so you can stand wonderfully on your own, you should not want to hang them on the wall (hole is of course present in the middle at the back)

The pictures are individually printed with the letters - therefore there may be small deviations to the product photo.
For this, each one is a little one-of-a-kind :-))

results.title: 2 Set Printable, 2 Set Wall Art, Live Love Laugh Printables, Eat Drink Love Wall Decor, Kitchen Printables, Dining Room Prints, Love Prints
results.description:
2 Set Printable Art: Live Love Laugh + Eat Drink Love. Display them together as a set or in different rooms of your home.  Happy downloadable art to brighten the spirit of your surroundings. You receive both printables!

When you purchase, you’ll get high resolution (300 dpi) JPEG files and high quality PDF files. These are to download. Nothing physical will be sent in the mail. It does not include frames.

These files can be printed at home (smaller size) OR by your favorite professional printer using photo paper, cardstock, or canvas. Some like to print at Walgreens, CVS, Michael’s, Home Depot, Office Depot or a local print shop. Others like online services such as VistaPrint, Shutterfly, or other online companies.  You can then frame the prints as you like, or have it done professionally!

Included sizes:

2:3 Ratio Prints up to 24x36" inches (60x90 cm)
Can be adjusted to:
Inch: 4x6", 6x9", 8x12", 10x15", 12x18", 16x24", 20x30", 24x36"
Cm: 10x15, 15x22, 20x28, 25x38, 30x45 50x75, 60x90)

4:5 Ratio Prints up to 16x20" inches (40x50 cm)
9Can be adjusted to:
Inch: 4x5", 8x10", 11x14", 12x15"
Cm: 10x12, 20x25, 28x35, 30x38)
And 11x14 inches (28X36 cm)

This is an affordable and creative way to make your space lovely! You own the file(s) and can reprint it as many times as you wish, or give as a gift. You cannot resell it though! 

Here’s how it works:
- Purchase this listing
- After payment is confirmed you will be taken to the download page, and an email will be sent to you with your download link
- Click “Download”, save the file to your computer, print, and enjoy!

They will also be accessible at all times by viewing your Etsy purchase page.

Please note: Refunds cannot be given after the items are downloaded.  If you have any problems, do contact me!
Please note that the colors may vary slightly from what you see on screen, depending on the printing service chosen.

Not that the final result highly depends on the print quality and materials used. I recommend using regular to heavy (150-270 gsm) white card stock, photo paper or art paper instead of a plain paper (80-90gsm).   Remember that different monitors display colors differently. Therefore, color may vary slightly from monitor to monitor.  

For HELP WITH DIGITAL DOWNLOADS, please see the Etsy help article:
https://help.etsy.com/hc/en-us/articles/115013328108-Downloading-a-Digital-Item
THANK YOU AGAIN AND ENJOY YOUR PRINTS!

results.title: Modern Cross Stitch Pattern pdf "Live, Laugh, F-ck Off" MATURE funny Cross Stitch Pattern Pdf Home Decor
results.description:
Cross stitch pattern - "Live, Laugh, Fuck Off" 

This modern cross stitch pattern let's you create a beautifully offensive mantra that pokes fun at the well known phrase. 

Pattern Details: 
The finished work will measure approximately 4.75 x 4.6 inches on 16 count aida, and is 76 x 73 stitches. It contains full stitches only. It requires 9 colours.

This is an instant download PDF, not a printed chart or completed article. Your file will be made available for download via Etsy once payment has been confirmed.

PDF includes: an info page, a one page pattern chart and a pattern chart split across 4 pages for ease of reading. Charts are full colour with symbols.

NOTES:
Designed and stitched with Anchor, although DMC conversions are provided. 
If you need a larger pattern chart, black and white etc. please get in touch.

All cross stitch patterns are designed by Lauren of Plastic Little Covers. Please do not sell or share the pattern designs/charts, and please do not sell for profit any finished cross stitch made from a Plastic Little Covers pattern. I’m happy for finished works to be sold/donated in aid of charity, but please do let me know where possible. Thank you!

*** FAUX GOLD/GLITTER effect
If your design contains any gold foil or glitter, please be aware of the fact that it’s a digital effect. It will print with regular colors to simulate gold/glitter. There will not be any texture or actual gold foil nor glitter on your final product. 
To keep gold foil effect it is better to use gloss or semi-gloss paper for printing.

For personal use only, not for resale or redistribution. Print as many as you wish for personal use!

results.title: Live Well Laugh Often Love Much Word Stencil - Whimsical - 7" x 7" SKU: STCL711_1
results.description:
Live Well Laugh Often Love Much Word Stencil - 7" x 7" by StudioR12

  Sometimes you just need to say a little something – word and letter stencils from StudioR12       make it easy! Hundreds of words & letters available in a wide range of sizes and styles

  Why use our stencils? Because our stencils allow you to create and enhance your projects quickly and easily. Stencils do the hard work for you – no more tedious linework, taping, or tracing. Our stencils have been carefully-designed by professional artists, so that the finished product doesn't look like it was done with a stencil – it looks like art!

 Each stencil is precision cut from durable, flexible 7.5mil mylar. This translucent material is easy to clean, food safe, and chemical resistant*. With proper care and cleaning, you can use them a thousand times!

  Our stencils work with nearly every medium imaginable, and nearly every surface. Paint on wood, ink on fabric, chalk on paper, glitter and thick mediums in your scrapbook, spray paint on your furniture, even the frosting on your cake!

   Use for card making, wall painting, pen, pencil, decorative painting, folk art, mixed media – mask, emboss, etch, create patterns, mix and match for unlimited creativity!

 Dimensions: 7" x 7" (Actual cutout area: 6" x 5.5")

 

*Mylar may be damaged by cleaners containing ammonia or lye

Stencils for Wood Signs are one of the easiest ways to make meaningful gifts and crafts to share with friends, family and loved ones. When you use stencils for painting, your crafting results are greatly improved!

results.title: Pink Cushion - printed - lavender

results.title: Live Laugh Love, Love Home Decor, Love Shelf Wood, Live Every Moment, Laugh Every Day, Love Beyond Words
results.description:
This Gray Stained and Black Painted Wood Sign that says Live, Laugh, Love is the perfect Love home wall decor or shelf sitter to live every moment, Laugh every day, and Love beyond words. This also makes a great gift for family and friends for any occasion.


***Size and Details***

Apprx 5.5” (H) X 12” (W)
Made from Premium knot free pine wood
Satin Clear coat finish for protection
Routed keyhole hanger on the back for easy hanging

All of our signs are hand carved into the wood, painted, stained and clear coated at the time of order. We do not use CNC Machines or Vinyl stickers, so each one will be slightly different and unique and made to last.



***How to order Details*** 

The Live Laugh Live wood home Decor sign shown is Black Painted font and border with a Classic Gray stain background.

**At Checkouts Please choose your paint color options for the Primary color (font and border) and your Secondary stain color (background)** 

**Photo 9 Shows the color's and Name of each of our Primary Paint Colors.
Photo 10 Shows the Color's and Names of each of our Secondary Stain Color's**

If there is a different color or size that you would like please feel free to message me with the contact button to discuss. We are more than happy to create a custom piece for you.

Please keep in mind that wood is a natural item and every piece has unique coloring and wood grain patterns.  Paint, Stain and finishes may vary slightly due to the inconsistencies in wood properties and picture lighting.


Each item is hand carved, so please know that there could be  flaws and stroke marks, but that is what gives each item its character. 


**Expected ship dates and Shipping methods**

This Item is expected to ship in 3-5 business days from the time of order. This Item ships USPS first class mail. If you need expedited shipping please contact me prior to your order to get current expedited shipping rates.

Thank You for Stopping By we look forward to creating something for you!

Be sure to check out the rest of my Hand Carved wooden signs at 
www.pfpwooddesign.Etsy.com
